ARABIC: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ لَا يَخْلُقُونَ شَيْـًٔا وَهُمْ يُخْلَقُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Those you call on besides Allah do not create anything. They are themselves created.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: , As for those they call besides God, they cannot create a thing, and have themselves been created.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Those whom they call upon beside Allah have created nothing; rather, they themselves were created;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Whatever (idols) they worship besides God can create nothing for they are themselves created.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And those whom they worship other than Allah, do not create anything but are themselves created.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Those whom they invoke besides Allah have not created anything, but are themselves created.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And those whom they call on besides Allah have not created anything while they are themselves created;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And those they call upon, apart from God, created nothing, and themselves are created,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Those unto whom they cry beside Allah created naught, but are themselves created.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Those you call on besides God cannot create anything. They are themselves created.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And those upon whom they call beside Allahls have not created aught, and are themselves created.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Those whom they invoke besides Allah do not create anything and are themselves created.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Those whom they invoke besides Allah create nothing and are themselves created.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Those whom they (Al-Mushrikun) invoke besides Allah have not created anything, but are themselves created.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: But those whom you invoke, other than Allah do not create anything they are themselves created.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Those they invoke besides God create nothing, but are themselves created.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And those they invoke other than Allah create nothing, and they [themselves] are created.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [16:20] And those whom you invoke (tad‘ūna, or read yad‘una ‘they invoke’) besides God, namely, the idols, do not create anything, but are themselves created, fashioned from stones and other [materials].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Those unto whom they cry) they worship (beside Allah created naught) they cannot create anything like Our creation, (but are themselves created) they are themselves carved.
